channel.title: Jacmoes Cyber Soapbox
channel.description: Recent content on Jacmoes Cyber Soapbox

item.title: Creatively Writing Longhand
item.description: Preface Two years ago I wanted to start writing by hand. I quickly realized, however, that I couldn’t do it. My handwriting was inefficient, inconsistent and unreadable. My hand cramped up and I could not write for more than fifteen minutes at a time. I have written journals by hand all my life, but with the advent of the computer I stopped writing in longhand. And I forgot how to do it.

item.title: Welcome to my new blog
item.description: My old blog at WordPress only has one single post in it. I wrote it using Org-mode in Emacs, and used an extension to put it on WordPress. That was good. I had to perform a lot of tweaking to the HTML, however, and that has obviously put me off just writing blog posts. That was bad. So, I wanted something as easy as writing a blog post in my favorite writing environment, committing the changes to git source control, and pushing it to a remote repository to be hosted.
